Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item boasts a range of features that make it stand out in its category, offering unparalleled performance and quality. Given its unique value proposition, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10000. Should you choose to accept this offer, you'll be making an investment in excellence. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
